title: Foundational Digital Information Literacy Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and experience with internet searches
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphones as primary learning tools to cultivate information literacy for solving everyday mathematical problems.

learning_goals: Learners can identify credible online information sources to solve everyday problems.
Learners can process and analyze mathematical information using digital tools (calculator apps, data visualization tools, etc.).
Learners can communicate with team members on online collaboration platforms to complete project-based assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
